particleFilter.h
1#pragma once
2
3#include "Eigen/Eigen"
4#include "units/units.hpp"
5#include "sensorModel.h"
6
7#include <random>
8#include <algorithm>
9
10#include "config.h"
11
21template<size_t L>
22class ParticleFilter {
23 // Ensure particles are less than the max of 500 particles
24 static_assert(std::less_equal<size_t>()(L, 500));
25
26private:
30 std::array<std::array<float, 2>, L> particles;
31 std::array<std::array<float, 2>, L> oldParticles;
32 std::array<float, L> weights;
33
34 Eigen::Vector3f prediction{};
35
36 std::vector<SensorModel *> sensors;
37
38 QLength distanceSinceUpdate = 0.0;
39 QTime lastUpdateTime = 0.0;
40
41 QLength maxDistanceSinceUpdate = 1_in;
42 QTime maxUpdateInterval = 2_s;
43
44 std::function<Angle()> angleFunction;
45 std::ranlux24_base de;
46
47 std::uniform_real_distribution<> fieldDist{-1.78308, 1.78308};
48
49public:
50 explicit ParticleFilter(std::function<Angle()> angle_function)
51 : angleFunction(std::move(angle_function)) {
52 for (auto &&particle: particles) {
53 particle[0] = 0.0;
54 particle[1] = 0.0;
55 }
56 }
57
58 Eigen::Vector3f getPrediction() {
59 return prediction;
60 }
61
62 std::array<Eigen::Vector3f, L> getParticles() {
63 std::array<Eigen::Vector3f, L> particles;
64
65 const Angle angle = angleFunction();
66
67 for (size_t i = 0; i < L; i++) {
68 particles[i] = Eigen::Vector3f(this->particles[i][0], this->particles[i][1], angle.getValue());
69 }
70
71 return particles;
72 }
73
74 Eigen::Vector3f getParticle(size_t i) {
75 return {this->particles[i][0], this->particles[i][1], angleFunction().getValue()};
76 }
77
78 void update(const std::function<Eigen::Vector2f()> &predictionFunction) {
79 if (!isfinite(angleFunction().getValue())) {
80 return;
81 }
82
83 auto start = pros::micros();
84
85 const Angle angle = angleFunction();
86
87 for (auto &&particle: particles) {
88 auto prediction = predictionFunction();
89 particle[0] += prediction.x();
90 particle[1] += prediction.y();
91 }
92
93 distanceSinceUpdate += predictionFunction().norm();
94
95 if (distanceSinceUpdate < maxDistanceSinceUpdate && maxUpdateInterval > pros::millis() * millisecond) {
96 return;
97 }
98
99 for (auto &&sensor: this->sensors) {
100 sensor->update();
101 }
102
103 double totalWeight = 0.0;
104
105 for (size_t i = 0; i < L; i++) {
106 weights[i] = 1.0;
107
108 if (outOfField(particles[i])) {
109 particles[i][0] = fieldDist(de);
110 particles[i][1] = fieldDist(de);
111 }
112
113 auto particle = Eigen::Vector3f(particles[i][0], particles[i][1], angle.getValue());
114
115 for (const auto sensor: sensors) {
116 if (auto weight = sensor->p(particle); weight.has_value() && isfinite(weight.value())) {
117 weights[i] = weights[i] * weight.value();
118 }
119 }
120
121 weights[i] = weights[i];
122
123 totalWeight = totalWeight + weights[i];
124 }
125
126 if (totalWeight == 0.0) {
127 std::cout << "Warning: Total weight equal to 0" << std::endl;
128 return;
129 }
130
131 const double avgWeight = totalWeight / static_cast<double>(L);
132
133 std::uniform_real_distribution distribution(0.0, avgWeight);
134 const double randWeight = distribution(de);
135
136 for (size_t i = 0; i < particles.size(); i++) {
137 oldParticles[i] = particles[i];
138 }
139
140 size_t j = 0;
141 auto cumulativeWeight = 0.0;
142
143 float xSum = 0.0, ySum = 0.0;
144
145 for (size_t i = 0; i < L; i++) {
146 const auto weight = static_cast<double>(i) * avgWeight + randWeight;
147
148 while (cumulativeWeight < weight) {
149 if (j >= weights.size()) {
150 break;
151 }
152 cumulativeWeight += weights[j];
153 j++;
154 }
155
156 particles[i][0] = oldParticles[j - 1][0];
157 particles[i][1] = oldParticles[j - 1][1];
158
159 xSum += particles[i][0];
160 ySum += particles[i][1];
161 }
162
163 prediction = Eigen::Vector3f(xSum / static_cast<float>(L), ySum / static_cast<float>(L), angle.getValue());
164
165 lastUpdateTime = pros::millis() * millisecond;
166 distanceSinceUpdate = 0.0;
167 }
168
169 void initNormal(const Eigen::Vector2f &mean, const Eigen::Matrix2f &covariance, const bool flip) {
170 for (auto &&particle: this->particles) {
171 Eigen::Vector2f p = mean + covariance * Eigen::Vector2f::Random();
172 particle[0] = p.x();
173 particle[1] = p.y() * (flip ? -1.0 : 1.0);
174 }
175
176 prediction.z() = angleFunction().getValue();
177 distanceSinceUpdate += 2.0 * distanceSinceUpdate;
178 }
179
180 static bool outOfField(const std::array<float, 2> &vector) {
181 return vector[0] > 1.78308 || vector[0] < -1.78308 || vector[1] < -1.78308 || vector[1] > 1.78308;
182 }
183
184 void initUniform(const QLength minX, const QLength minY, const QLength maxX, const QLength maxY) {
185 std::uniform_real_distribution xDistribution(minX.getValue(), maxX.getValue());
186 std::uniform_real_distribution yDistribution(minY.getValue(), maxY.getValue());
187
188 for (auto &&particle: this->particles) {
189 particle[0] = xDistribution(de);
190 particle[1] = yDistribution(de);
191 }
192 }
193
194 void addSensor(SensorModel *sensor) {
195 this->sensors.emplace_back(sensor);
196 }
197
198 Angle getAngle() {
199 return angleFunction();
200 }
201};
ParticleFilter
Initializes a particle filter with a pre-specified number of particles.

Defiens a SensorModel to be used in the ParticleFilter. This is used in the update step to revise the...
